name: accumulator-record
description: A record of accumulator values at a specific time, including present value and status.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The date and time of the accumulator record.

fields.description: The present value at the time of the record.

fields.name: accumulated-value
fields.description: The accumulated total value at the time of the record.

fields.name: accumulator-status

values.name: recovered

fields.description: The operational status of the accumulator.
